uvi.description:
net: caif: fix memory leak in ldisc_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.14 by commit e056cc440ae71fda770814a7aa865279fc8d6462. For more details please see the references link.
